plugin.name: PowerSave
plugin.title: PowerSave
plugin.desc: Power off your squeezebox after a certain amount of time (idle or otherwise)
plugin.creator: Jason Holtzapple

plugin.name: DirectPlay
plugin.title: DirectPlay
plugin.desc: Play albums, artists or songs directly by database ID
plugin.creator: Jason Holtzapple

plugin.name: QuickAccess
plugin.title: QuickAccess
plugin.desc: QuickAccess provides similar functionality as Favorites plus the possibility to pass a playlist from player to player. Just press and hold a number button and the assigned playlist starts playing. You may select playlists from each player or your server's web interface. You will also need to place the custom.map file (http://jasonholtzapple.github.io/slimdevices/plugins/quickaccess/7.3/custom.map) in your Squeezecenter/IR directory by hand.
plugin.creator: Jason Holtzapple
